DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research determine whether repetitive session transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) prefrontal cortex enhance cognitive , affective motor function Parkinson 's Disease . In study compare active tDCS sham tDCS . Each subject receive two consecutive week stimulation ( Monday Friday ) . A battery neuropsychological affective test administer throughout duration study .
